overview: Derya, who wants to divorce Güney, can't get what she wants, forgets the bag full of money her father left for her, and leaves. Sadri decides to have the hotel project drawn, as misunderstandings arise in the village square and word leaks out about the bag of money. Now begins a series of events in which what happened between Derya and Güney and the events in the hotel affair are interwoven.
title: Hayır Oluversin Gari
